summary: This release adds a proper onboarding flow at plant.grove.place, so new sites can get started easily. We've migrated authentication to Heartwood OAuth, added a dark mode toggle to the landing page, and introduced a credits page for fonts and tech. Under the hood, we fixed multi-tenant routing and updated our footer branding to Lattice.
